journal-meta.journal-title: The American Journal of Sports Medicine

permissions.copyright-holder: American Orthopaedic Society for Sports Medicine

abstract.p: Mommma D, Iwasaki N, Oizumi N, Nakatsuchi H, Funakoshi T, Kamishima T, Tadano S, Minami A. Long-term stress distribution patterns across the elbow joint in baseball players assessed by computed tomography osteoabsorptiometry. Am J Sports Med. 2011;39(2):336-341. (Original DOI: 10.1177/0363546510383487)

body.p: In the above article, the first author was incorrectly listed as “Daisuke Mommma, MD.” The correct listing is “Daisuke Momma, MD.” Updated citation information is as follows:

Momma D, Iwasaki N, Oizumi N, Nakatsuchi H, Funakoshi T, Kamishima T, Tadano S, Minami A. Long-term stress distribution patterns across the elbow joint in baseball players assessed by computed tomography osteoabsorptiometry. Am J Sports Med. 2011;39(2):336-341.
